website_summaries.verdict: Azulle's Quantum Access Stick is an inexpensive Windows 10 PC that fits in the palm of your hand. Functionality and connectivity are basic, but it's very easy to set up and use, and the Ethernet port is a nice bonus.
cons: Single USB port limits peripheral options
Windows takes up almost half the available storage space

customer_reviews.title: Durable, hardworking and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fair computer for the price. I purchased about 30 of them altogether in June of 2018 and have them running SteepleMate public billboards, marquees and kiosks. The machines run 24/7 remotely at client sites and have done quite well for a machine that costs about $100. Just got my first defect in Oct. of 2019...not bad for a machine that has run nonstop for nearly a year and a half. Hopefully I won't be getting 29 more over the next few months, but even still they have been great little machines. Light on horsepower of course, but quite sufficient for a lot of applications. Thanks Azulle.
customer_reviews.author: TBLong

customer_reviews.title: Unique and useful
customer_reviews.text: This little PC is so much better for semi-embedded tasks than the usual tablet or notebook. It doesn't have a battery system to fail, and can be configured to automatically boot when it's powered up to recover from power failures. I have one that's been powering a shop status display 24/7 for months, and I've only had to forcibly reboot it a couple of times, and it has recovered itself from dozens of power failures and cycles (our power is REALLY unreliable). It replaces a parade of tablets, netbooks, and notebooks which have all developed power supply problems because they weren't intended for continuous service and I didn't need their displays or keyboards either.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but the antenna had broke with normal use
customer_reviews.text: After 45 days of trying product didn’t work for me, but wish it did. Unexpected pauses of delays while typing - tried various things to fix, wired keyboard, etc. Unit gets hot, antenna broke with normal usage. No help from company after following their warranty process, however, Amazon took good care of me as they always do and supported me with a return beyond their normal return window.
customer_reviews.author: Rider

customer_reviews.title: this is a great PC for my
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this into my tuner ( via an HDMI cable, plugged in a Logitech universal wireless USB ada[pter to connect the mouse and keyboard ( as I sit 8 feet away from the equipment. The tuner is hooked up to a 10-foot screen fed by an Optoma 1080i 3D projector (, I added a 32 GB micro-flash card. I use 1600x900 display settings I use office 365 and surf, this is a great PC for my usage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shame that the price is high because of the Windows license.
customer_reviews.text: I loaded up Fedora 28 Server no problem and I'm running it headless with aand. I needed to change a setting in the BIOS to get it to reboot without the need of a keyboard. Some message was popping up during boot and had to be dismissed by hitting enter a few times. After the BIOS setting change, I have myself a little linux server. :D
customer_reviews.author: Brain in a Vat

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I needed something unique, can be attached neatly behind my TV screen AND QUIET. I've been using this computer for about two months now, and I am very happy with it. i usually use it 2 to 6 hours every day streaming TV series and watching YouTube I downloaded only Google Chrome and two more applications. I didn't download any video games I didn't activate the Microsoft office bundle I'm keeping it light and it works well
customer_reviews.author: Mashael

customer_reviews.title: Okay, Should have bought the box version
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good little computer. It is fast enough for most streaming, and I was even able to play some League of Legends on it! However, it was too big to plug directly into my TV, so I had to get an HDMI extension cable for it. Then the WIFI became flakey and eventually died, so I am using an external WIFI adapter, which means that I had to get a USB hub so that I can still use it with my little Logitech keyboard. I think it would have been worth it to pay a little bit more for the box version for the extra connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. K.

customer_reviews.title: great price - works great - fast and seemingly powerful enough.
customer_reviews.text: Received mini PC stick yesterday (08/02/2016) and plugged it into the back of my Samsung monitor. Hooked up a USB expander. For some reason MS's bluetooth keyboard/mouse was not recognized by the mini pc's bluetooth, so I plugged in the usb-bluetooth that came with the MS bluetooth keyboard/mouse and I was on my way. Set up fine, installed chrome and MS silverlight. Only concerns I have is that the HDMI port on the monitor may become warn out due to the weight of mini pc and that too many USB devices my overtask the mini PC's usb port. I'll have to get a self powered usb expander to prevent burning out the mini PC.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little computer on a stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little computer on a stick. It's a little slow but that is to be expected. Great for browsing the web. My only complaint is video playback. Even playing 720P video, it drops frames. I tried every video player imaginable, and got the best results using media player classic with the K lite video codec pack. Even with this I still got dropped frames to the point. Eventually the audio would be far out of sync with the video as well. Other than that it's a great little unit for doing basic computer tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Rygon

customer_reviews.title: The Good, The Bad and The Ugly
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD; Once setup (easy setup) I can't tell any difference from using any full size low power Windows 10 computer except you don't need to take a day off from work just to delete all of "bloatware" . THE BAD; You will need an HDMI port save cable to connect to most TV/Displays and also a USB "OTG" cable adapter if you want to use both USB ports, ADD $15 to price for cables that many brand include free of charge. THE UGLY; I haven't found any USB (5V) source other than the supplied wall wort (5V/2A) thjat will power this thing.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Their answer is to reformat...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with software malfunctioning so DOA. Their advice was to format the computers. Months later the WIFI can not be found. Their advice is to format the computer. You know, some people don't want to reformat their hard drive every couple months. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Pearce

customer_reviews.title: now just a small paper weight
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, but it quit yesterday after about 4 months use. While working, it did everything I expected very well. However, when I turned it on yesterday, it did not load up and would not shut off. I unplugged it, waited a minute and plugged it back in. It came on immediately without using "on": button(?), still would not load, and won't shut off with "on-off" button. I repeated this process several times, waiting over night with "unit of" for last try. It is now just a small paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Great for surveillance monitoring
customer_reviews.text: My use case: I used this compact little PC in a stick to setup a remote security surveillance monitor in my kitchen. The Amcrest surveillance DVR taps into my Wi-Fi network and allows for live viewing via a computer on the same network. What's the point of having a viewing station in your office? I had a spare monitor, plugged this baby in, and it works like a charm. My only complaint is if I run the surveillance streams at 720p, the little stick gets super hot. When I dropped it to lower resolution, the temp dropped to normal. I'd suspect prolonged use at any HD resolution would result in a similar experience. Perhaps not the optimal HTPC solution.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it right now. Very versatile. Have it attached to a small monitor where I play video games and I use the same keyboard for both (bluetooth) you have to be wary of the memory but other than that it is fast enough to work with on non-mission critical stuff and did I mention it's like $100. I think it's money well spent. I just wish there was a Linux version, but, that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Works well but wireless is lackluster
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive piece of hardware. I didn't expect that it would be as useful as I've found it to be. I use to think that casting my screen would be effective enough but it's not when compared to the performance of this device. Combined with a wireless Logitech keyboard and some right angle HDMI connectors, this rig works well in my Sharp Quattron. Might not be great for gaming but family Internet browsing and YouTube works great. Wireless networking on this device is not very good so I bought a usb 3.0 to ethernet adapter and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Tad C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This thing is perfect if you are using it to do the basics
customer_reviews.text: I received this for a Christmas gift, so this review is only for the initial set and updates. This thing is perfect if you are using it to do the basics. I ran Netflix and Vudu on it with no problem I was able to update to Win10 and it ran all the office programs perfect. It is relatively fast, although I am sure a better processor would be faster. Overall the complaints are very minor. The only issue I had is the stick takes up 2 hdmi ports if they are stacked, but easily fixed with an hdmi extender. The positives are to many to list. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: I'm bummed out seemed like a good concept
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few weeks with light usage. it got very hot when watching Netflix around 138 F with my digital thermometer, now it says it can't find wireless drivers so I have no Wifi. Also the Quote on Quote "Bluetooth" never worked from day 1. and to add insult I never recived my warrenty. I'm bummed out seemed like a good concept. I will reach out to the company to see if they can make this right with me
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great little PC!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about this mini-pc! I still use as a bedroom Pc and still cannot believe it is the size of most of my music cassette cases! Picks up wireless internet as well as my Toshiba Satellite Laptop does and has many ways to connect peripherals like wireless keyboards, mouse, usb speakers, Mp3 players, and etc.and am adding a 500 Gb external for music and video along with a blue ray player. This may be a future main system!
customer_reviews.author: Amon Guinn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, working well without issues.
customer_reviews.text: This mini pc is pretty cool. Very small and i keep it connected to my 55in Phillips TV. I will update this review after I have used this product more comprehensively. But I recommend this product for price, easy of installation and reliability-so far : )
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Bought this to use as a netflix machine. Died a few times, will not start now after owning it after a year or two. Please check the tech support forums on the company site, this is a common problem, and their answer is to factory reload. The user manuals will not even properly download off their own website. Support forums do not appear to be helpful or maintained well.
customer_reviews.author: jim Bohan

customer_reviews.title: 6 months on and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this PC to take with me on a trip during the new year and six months later it's still running like a trooper. Is it really fast? Nope, but the CPU and WIFi are more than adequate for Office 365, Hulu, and U-Tube. I take it with me whenever I want to travel light. Otherwise, l and leave it plugged into my kitchen TV in case a coworker Skypes me while I'm making coffee or I want to watch a show during lunch. I like it so much that I'm going to dedicate one for my RV.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: This PC stick is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This PC stick is amazing. Like most people here, it takes me hours, days and even months to research products before I make my purchase. This PC stick met my top 3 criteria: value, quality and performance. My main concern was how it will perform with several programs running. While streaming a movie, with Youtube playing in the back ground, and me clicking on pictures on my desktop to view, it was able to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: DDavid

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2, one failed within a short time and it was (eventually) replaced. Within 8 months, they (including the replacement) failed. No longer booting. Not worth the time or effort to work with them if they are only going to fail this frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Ursan

customer_reviews.title: Update:  It died after less than two years of use.  Unable to format disk and reinstall software through multiple means.
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job. Using it as a computer for a telescope equatorial mount to use for autoguiding. Because it is Atom powered, it's not as quick as your standard laptop so the transmission of data through a VPN is not as quick and there is lag. Storage can be upgraded through a micro-USB card. I anticipate that there should be other uses for this, especially if the CPU's can be upgraded in the future while still maintaining a low power draw.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Nothing short of amazing as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.text: Nothing short of amazing as far as I'm concerned. I plugged it. It booted up. The set up was simple. I selected Custom set up because I don't want the automatic updates to Windows 10 on this device. I'm using it for one specific application that needs to run on my home network and I didn't want to leave my laptops running all the time. ..... UPDATE.... Outstanding customer service by phone and email. I ran into a problem of my own making and they helped me out promptly.
customer_reviews.author: edr

customer_reviews.title: (or in my case a HDMI extension cable) and is fast enough to behave like a normal PC
customer_reviews.text: A ton of PC power packed into a silly small package. Starts up fast, plugs directly into a monitor, (or in my case a HDMI extension cable) and is fast enough to behave like a normal PC! I just tote this back and forth to work now instead of my laptop. I also popped in a 128gb micro SD to augment the built in 32gb, which goes pretty quick once you load up all of your normal desktop apps. Amazing value, amazing device!
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: This mini stick PC was a pretty nifty little product
customer_reviews.text: This mini stick PC was a pretty nifty little product, but it has design flaws that dramatically reduce longevity. Mine lasted about 6 weeks. The problem is the external HDMI, the device is too heavy to simply hang out of the HDMI port, eventually gravity beat the HDMI connector, It's unfortunate, if only they had used a female HDMI port my stick might have lasted many years. Better luck next time Azulle.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Masselink

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Hercules
customer_reviews.text: This little guy comes in handy when using a nice 60" LED TV to display schedules and weather information for my guys at work. I haven't put it to the test by streaming HD video or anything like that, so I can't speak to how it handles that sort of load, but overall, you cant beat having a pocket sized PC at your disposal. The only thing I would change is to have two (2) full-sized USB ports on it. One for a bluetooth keyboard/mouse combo, and another for a USB stick full of media. There is a micro sd option, but I personally don't use those very much. All in all, very please with this unit for the price!
customer_reviews.author: daveondemand

customer_reviews.title: CPU will max out running local app with animated GIF ...
customer_reviews.text: CPU will max out running local app with animated GIF. Assume required graphic processing for animated GIF is a little too much for it. Displays static images (JPG, PNG, with no delay. Have not found any other limitations. Bluetooth, Wireless all work well. Cannot beat the price! I have also tried the YELIN PC stick and it has a little more CPU power at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: EddieA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice PC and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice PC and works perfectly. I installed it on my 50 inch HDMI TV and works like a charm. Windows 10 works like a regular PC, wireless network works at the same speed as my other wireless devices. I had to purchase a flexible HDMI adapter that rotates 90 degrees in order to get it to attach to the HDMI port on my TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Saksena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little device
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little device. I bought to use as a display control. Simple to setup. You cant join a domain with this, so i couldnt RDP as i originally planned. Used free nomachine software and was able to remote control display from my laptop. Our company has many displays around the office now i dont have to shuffle all those remotes or get up anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lee I.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny spend!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks now and have it connected to a 32" HDTV with a wireless keyboard and mouse; a 2tb hard drive docking station. I loaded the latest Kodi and everythings works fantastically. I use Windows as a backup of my daily PC files. The WIFI antenna is a little flimsy but my download speed is 30+mbps without any issues. Hard to believe it is so small but so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: DPBoss

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I own a large Real Estate office in Arizona. I originally purchased this product over a year ago for my conference room and big screen TV to show properties and write contracts. It's been running non stop since I plugged it in with no problems. I have since purchased 2 more to replace the outdated XP's at the reception area and lobby. Originally I was concerned with the heat but even in 110 degree weather, I haven't had any problems. It's really simple to set up although I do suggest a HDMI extension cable and additional USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Willis

customer_reviews.title: Surprised with the great performance in such a small package!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it to run a powerpoint display for a trade show and it worked great. The file is massive and it was able to keep up with the graphics processing for the animations and images. I also used it to stream some video and browse the web and it was quick. Now keep in mind this isn't an 8 core superstar but it gets the job done without delay.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: One of the most wonderful product I bought online
customer_reviews.text: One of the most wonderful product I bought online. I was looking for device that will allow me to browse internet on my smart TV. Guys don't be fooled by Roku or other similar stuff. You cannot surf Internet with them and all "smart" TVs not smart at all. But with PC you can do everything you do on your desktop or laptop with any TV that has HDMI connector. This little PC easy to install and booting is fast.
customer_reviews.author: MOSTVIT

customer_reviews.title: ... after letting it do Microsoft updates it runs just fine. It does get quite hot at times when ...
customer_reviews.text: It came with Windows 10 pre-installed and after letting it do Microsoft updates it runs just fine. It does get quite hot at times when watching hd video but it has never shut down or showed any artifacts on the screen. The SSD storage does get used up quickly also but all you have to do is pop in an SD card for extra room. I would say it is a good buy if you can get a used or refurbished one at a lower price point.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Plugged it in, using a Logitech K400 keyboard. I'm just using this for streaming flash video in Chrome and for that it works great. Sticking with 8.1 because (1) it works so why mess with it, who knows if it'll find all the drivers in Win10 and (2) I like the UI of 8.1 so I don't have to back-engineer a Win10 UI to look the way i want.
customer_reviews.author: Mark my Words

customer_reviews.title: Well it was working fine until i started watching youtube
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with power supply. A new power supply was sent and system is working great. Thank you for supporting your product! Amazon needs a way to contact manufacturers directly. Well it was working fine until i started watching youtube... Now it runs for 30 minutes and simply shuts down. I'm not sure how to get product support. I only just started using it and it seems dead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best in class
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for over 8 months. This is the best computer I have owned at this size. Much smaller than the Raspberri Pi and runs a desktop version of Windows 10. Runs HD video smoothly and seems to be rock solid stable as I have left it on for months without a hiccup. Overheating does not appear to be an issue. USB port also has enough power to run external portable hard drives, powered hub not needed. Overall, highly satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Pascal

customer_reviews.title: Love IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little PC, loaded KODI for home media center. It needs a HDMI extension or a female to female coupler for connecting to a TV. You might be able to use a 90 or 270 degrees HDMI connector for the TV connection. Upgraded to Windows 10 because 8.1 was unstable and it locked up periodically. I had no issue streaming wirelessly. I will buy another for parents.
customer_reviews.author: Sep Jane Yu

customer_reviews.title: It works at best. The performance is poor being only a few ...
customer_reviews.text: It works at best. The performance is poor being only a few feet away from the wireless router. The paired keyboard is also a pain. Without rambling on about every little thing I hated about this, I'll just say don't buy it. It's just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Turner

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would use this as a shop computer and could pair it with a mobile monitor and take it with me when I needed to, but after six months of light use, it failed to boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted over the past year!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on 10/3/2015. Started using December 2015/January 2016. Worked fine until it bricked last week. Azulle tech support wants $65.00 plus shipping for repair or exchange--only 60 days out of warranty? No thanks...I'll get a small media PC as a replacement instead of a disposable piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Stasis

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little unit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to run my whole home audio application. Power supply stopped working after a few weeks. Returned to Amazon. My only complaint is that these aren't 64-bit. I switched to the 64-bit unit with 4gb ram. Much better performance.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: streaming nice
customer_reviews.text: I was suspicious and took the chance and have no regrets. running w10 with vpn for my streaming needs. so long as you don't expect core i7 performance, great value for the price. this model has N wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: great device
customer_reviews.text: this thing is working as my living room computer now, taped to the back of a monitor and with a wireless keyboard/mouse plugged in. works suprisingly well, but i sure wish they designed it with 4GB RAM instead of two. storage space is not terrible. (fast) SD card should solve that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Super small and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Would have given the product a higher review, but the one I received did not have an active version of windows on it. I paid for 2 day shipping (I don't have prime) and now after configuring everything, I have to send it back and wait for them to send me a new one. I still give it 3 stars because it works really well for what I needed it to. Super small and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Punch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to run Sega & Nintendo emulators. With the addition of a wireless keyboard & mouse, a couple USB hubs, some USB replica game controllers, a flash drive, it works like a charm. It's not the fastest, doesn't have the most memory, but if you're looking for a portable, more bare-bones machine, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little guy. Can watch Netflix, Hulu and YouTube without trouble. Fine for surfing the web. Obviously not the most powerful machine, but that's clearly communicated by the specs so you know what you're getting. It's not a gaming machine. Only had it for a couple of months so I can't speak to longevity, but I've used it heavily without any real problems. One more USB port would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so lame...
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in, boot it up, it immediately tells me windows cannot be installed. What? I thought Windows was supposed to have been done already installed. So now I'm downloading the restore files from azulletech and hoping that I can install windows on this.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Starshine

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend to buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This item was just as described and quality made, but customer service is awful. I would recommend it and/or buy it again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kosmopolites

customer_reviews.title: This piece of junk was working fine for a couple months and with absolutely no heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: In the process of contacting the seller for a refund or replacement. This piece of junk was working fine for a couple months and with absolutely no heavy or out of oridnary use, it ceased to turn on a few days ago. $130 wasted - would have been better off buying the legitmate Intel CompuStick.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great pc if you are looking for a light no frills windows experience.
customer_reviews.text: Great mini pc for extremely light workloads. This is a great Windows 10 small form factor but don’t expect it to handle more than extremely light workloads. Also expect it to get hot during use.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a cord cutter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be used as an HTPC, and, in that capacity, this stick has been amazing! As a replacement an older Windows machine, I first tried a Kodi box, but it was buggy, and Android didn't translate well to a large screen. This stick, though, meets all of my needs: it's silent, low power consumption for being always on, it has Windows, WiFi, and it's stable. It runs Kodi, local media, Netflix, and Amazon video all flawlessly. My one minor complaint here is that the windows update process was painfully slow for the first day, and it affected the performance of everything else I was running. After that, all apps have run smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to turn old HD TV into large computer
customer_reviews.text: Surprize of the year. This thing works well. Nice way to turn old HD TV into large computer. Comes with full WIN10. I added blue tooth keyboard for $19, mini SD card with 32 GB storage for $16 and it now is great fully functional spare family computer for under $125. unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: That's all I care about - windows has all the best codecs. And it's fast enough to do that
customer_reviews.text: This thing totally works. It's a little windows PC in a teeny little box. The only complaint I have is that even though it's quite small, it's still just a smidgen too large to fit in the HDMI port without bumping into the other connectors. I had to buy a short HDMI extension cord ($5) to make it work out. I've used it to play 1080p videos that I've downloaded from the internet. That's all I care about - windows has all the best codecs. And it's fast enough to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Yelon

customer_reviews.title: Good product until fail after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and ease of set up and using for powerpoint slideshow on 65" TV in commercial office. Now it has failed and trying Amazon support for help. I will update you as I deal with Azulle.....
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Good but short lasting...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it died. Almost exactly one day short of one year it died....I think the problem is that the heat buildup when running VLC or other media player. The device gets quiet hot. I think over time the longevity all of the CPU gets affected by the Heat.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice windows micro computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice windows micro computer. It's perfect for browsing the internet and monitoring cameras around the house. i haven't tried streaming video like Netflix yet. But it's probably going to be good for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Billiardman

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job of playing my netflix and HBO Go
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of playing my netflix and HBO Go. I don't try to multitask with it. I just wanted to watch my streaming stuff. There was way too much buffering going on with Amazon Fire TV and that device was right next to my router. Very satisfied with this little stick.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at how well it works
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how well it works. Added a USB hub to connect to a wireless keyboard/pad, instruments, and USB drive for added memory. USer for collecting data from instruments and also set up as an FTP server. Works great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: T White

customer_reviews.title: Great micro PC
customer_reviews.text: This little stick works very well, It has no problem running my 55" LG for under $100 I like it better than my bigger PC's My mouse uses the small USB freeing up the full size USB for my printer or DVD player. my keyboard is a bluetooth unit.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Talk to the Support Team if you run into activation problems
customer_reviews.text: after much weeping and gnashing of teeth, including emailing the company, this little piece of magic works as described, and is well worth the price. Futile efforts trying to activate, and after several emails with support, and the advice of my 12 year old son, this device is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Run Todd

customer_reviews.title: but it really works fine with just 2
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second one. Upgraded to Windows 10 right away- no problems. Wish they offered at least 4gb of RAM, but it really works fine with just 2. Question for the group; how do I pair my Bluetooth or wifi keyboard with this, without putting the little dongle in the one and only USB slot? Wish list for Azule? 4-8 gb RAM, 128gb SSD, and at least one more USB port! That's all it really needs!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly if you want simple computing. I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly if you want simple computing. I can even run AutoCAD on a remote computer if needed. Very interesting toy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it lasted, Doesn't play x265, Used it as a Kodi and email device. Some flash gamming as well.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Oct. 2015, Started to overheat in June 2017. Auto shuts down after temps reach a certain level. Windows makes that noise like a peripheral is being unplugged and replugged before it shuts down. Not quite 2 years out of her before she started to crap out. I may take her apart to see what needs soldering.
customer_reviews.author: Zextul

customer_reviews.title: Too slow to be usefull
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Constantly disconnects from WiFi, incredibly slow screen-to-screen even if not surfing the web. The warmer if gets the slower it operates. Use of a small fan proved this.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: been using this for a year now and it's fantastic. i bought a monitor and keyboard to go ...
customer_reviews.text: been using this for a year now and it's fantastic. i bought a monitor and keyboard to go alongside, but i think overall the whole pacakge cost me around $200, which is insane. if you're trying to do adobe products (photoshop etc.) then this is likely not the best option for you, but i've managed just fine using products like filmora for movie editing and pixlr for photo editing. would highly recommend if you're on a budget and/or trying to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Burns

customer_reviews.title: A little gem!
customer_reviews.text: What a little gem! I can travel anywhere in the world, as long as there is a tv with a HDMI attachment I have my PC windows 10 with me. It takes no time to upgrade from Windows 8 to 10 and this little gadget is ready to work in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Max Strano

customer_reviews.title: This item is overall good but has some small flaws such as frequently dropping ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is overall good but has some small flaws such as frequently dropping of Wi-Fi connections and not supporting 5G Wireless. If you are looking for a PC Stick toy I would recommend buying the latest model Access Plus
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get around commercials. Go You Tube and line up your drinks before you sit down.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: This item worked fine for 8 months and now it will not stay connected to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dean

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One for a customer and one for a demo for a project. First one was great. Worked great two. Second one the antenna was knocked of the clips. I was able to put it back on but not as solid as the first one for the customer. Overall I like these and hopefully will be buying lots more for these projects that I am designing. I would like to talk to someone about my project and what it would take to get these direct from vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe M

customer_reviews.title: It's good if you don't care about going into the internet.
customer_reviews.text: The network adapter completely just wiped itself from the computer. It only lasted five months in some light to moderate use. I did a full reset and it worked for about 2 weeks now it's gone again. Tried resetting again, and I think the network card is officially dead. It's a shame as it was a very good product, but it can't even last a full six months before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Crashed and won't reboot within hours of using it
customer_reviews.text: It took a major dump within hours of using it. The screen cut off violently in the middle of file sharing and now it won't boot, it just shows a yellow screen. I don't know what happened, i'm pretty sad it didn't work out. The only thing I can think of is it got too hot? Or the micro USB wasn't charging it enough (it's a very flimsy cable that charges it). I don't know. This product really sucks, 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headlines says Windows 10 but has Windows 8.1
customer_reviews.text: Headlines says Windows 10 but has Windows 8.1. Flat out wrong headline.
customer_reviews.author: רפאל

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty sweet little device
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sweet little device. Wish there were something this small that had a bit more memory and that could run a 64 bit OS but hey, these things are perfect for a office machine or something to plug into the tv in the living room!
customer_reviews.author: David Woody

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work well for me. Was only using as a web browser on the tv and just too slow and constantly need rebooted. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Shane_I

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and just right for surfing the web
customer_reviews.text: Great for using your Large TV to surf the web!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! I wish
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I wish, however, that it had more capacity or expandable. I also wished it had a direct audio out port, instead of relying solely on the HDMI output.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini PC
customer_reviews.text: This works very nicely, and it is quick overall. I would not load it with multiple pages though. I can use it for streaming videos and it works perfectly for that. Except for the Windows OS, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricus

customer_reviews.title: Real Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: No more messing with crappy smart TV apps. This thing gives you full blown windows with full access to everything. I got a USB hub and plugged in a webcam, now I've got Skype on my TV! Then I loaded up some emulators and plugged in my USB game controller - now I've got tons of retro-gaming on my TV! Now my TV truly is "SMART."
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Love this little device
customer_reviews.text: Love this little device. It allows me to have a pc on any tv that I want to use with a hdmi port. Have had no problems with it at all. Plugged a wireless keyboard into it and away you go.
customer_reviews.author: Orban

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and will definitely be buying another in the future ...
customer_reviews.text: MAME and Maximus Arcade run perfectly. Fears unfounded - I was initially a little concerned that this might not have the horsepower to respond to both multi-player controls, MAME and graphics. No issues with anything at all. Win 10 upgrade took a while, but was otherwise flawless, and configuration and use is just what you expect from a what is essentially a small laptop without screen or battery. Very pleased and will definitely be buying another in the future for other projects.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L.

customer_reviews.title: Helped me convert a smart TV that did not have flash
customer_reviews.text: Helped me convert a smart TV that did not have flash, play a video playback system I was using for advertising display system.
customer_reviews.author: Video Doc

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The only downside is that it won't charge from TV. You need to plug it to the charger
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Flores

customer_reviews.title: It has worked far better than we could have ever hoped
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to turn a TV into digital signage. It has worked far better than we could have ever hoped. We have not had any issues at all and it runs at least 10-12 hours a day. Will definitely purchase more if the need arises. Considering one for at home!
customer_reviews.author: MnA

customer_reviews.title: Small but fast
customer_reviews.text: am impressed. The computer is snappy. It is very responsive. Don't let the Atom processor type scare you. Four cores coupled with the solid state storage mean it is plenty fast for daily use. I use it for Kodi and daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel M.

customer_reviews.title: This is completely useless if you need to remotely use it through teamviewer ...
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of work, WiFi continuously stops working after 3hours of operation and it requires reboot. This is completely useless if you need to remotely use it through teamviewer or similar app. In addition, for some reason it sleeps while or windows and BIOS settings are arranged for not sleeping or hibernating at all!
customer_reviews.author: amars23

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit about 6 months ago and have enjoyed using it. I have it connected to a tv monitor at work to show sales numbers for the team. This past week it decided to stop working. I should've bought a chrome book instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Viramontes

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well considering the price. Do NOT put a 2.4GHz wireless keyboard/mouse anywhere near this or your network will be toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest as a media center
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping for more. It works fine overall, but i wish it had more storage and supported 5GHz WiFi. Also, it stutters when playing high frame-rate local videos using VLC or Kodi. I've connected it to a 60 inch TV.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing shipping was fast the great seller thank you very much
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing shipping was fast the great seller thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Nil Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer, with free upgrade to Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Awesome that such a small, low-priced computer does such a great job. You'll want to buy a USB microphone, so you can use the "Hey, Cortana" feature of Windows 10. You'll also want a USB hub, so you can plug in multiple USB devices.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pleasants

customer_reviews.title: New meaning to your TV set.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little thing. Great price. I installed one of the family's office 365 licenses with no problem. It is connected to my 9 year old TV screen now and will give her useful stuff to do and learn.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this device running almost nonstop for several weeks at a time (only to be used 1-2 days/week, however); and it has handled it's role as a living-room media center incredibly well. Streaming 4K video may experience some stuttering; but I have been able to play 3D films locally at 4K on a number of occasions and was surprised at how well it did. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution for an electronic bulletin board for our employee areas, and stumbled across this little gem. I love this thing! I was able to upgrade to Windows 10 with no problems. Even with it's small amount of RAM, it runs very well. What a great solution for what I was looking for! Would highly suggest! The only con I've seen so far, is that it does get a little hot, but I haven't noticed that it degrades performance. Would highly recommend this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: McFarlane Aviation Inc

customer_reviews.title: Junk critical hardware components and prone to OS drive corruption.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for about a week. So far, there has been an issue with the power supply USB cable being flaky and causing the system to be powered off while running frequently due to low quality USB cable or connector components. Now, it has a corrupted drive and is stuck in the EFI shell and won't boot, so the installation process I went through and the browser setup will have to be repeated (in the best case scenario, that is) after I restore to factory defaults using these instructions here [...] So, not happy. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Psy

customer_reviews.title: time sync issues
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a year as a server for my scanner. It worked fine at first, but now I am unable to get the time to update correctly. Tried all the usual time sync solutions but the computer`s time continues to tick very slowly. All signs point to a bad cmos battery and no way to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Naitze Teng

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Other than being cool, not a ton of functionality. I bought mine knowing full well that is use it for YouTube and Netflix. It gets the job done so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Azulle Quantum Access Fanless Mini PC Stick 2GB/32GB - Portable Business or Home Computer Device with Windows 10
feature_bullets: PORTABLE SYSTEM: Carry and access the power of Windows 10 everywhere you go in the most convenient and small form factor you desire. The Quantum Access is equipped with the latest full version of Windows 10. Micro USB DC Charging port 5V/2A.

PERFORMANCE: The Quantum Access is driven by the all-new Intel Atom (Quad-core) 1.33 GHZ Z3735F processor for maximum speed and quality. To ensure optimal performance, the Quantum Access offers 2GB of DDR3L RAM and a snappy 32GB of onboard memory.

INSTANT ACCESS: This mini PC is perfect for streaming media as it is fueled by a top-of-the-line Intel HD Graphics (Gen 7). With a built-in HDMI output, you can simply plug the Quantum Access into any HDMI port and instantly “access” your PC.

BUSINESS & HOME: Help your business thrive with a cost-efficient device that includes an Ethernet cable to be fully functional. Always have personal documents, run programs, and applications at home, in the office, your entertainment center, or bedroom.

VERSATILE POWER: Enjoy a device that excels in versatility as it provides a full USB 2.0 port, micro USB port, and micro SD card slot. This powerful combination of hardware is perfect for heavy word processing, high definition video streaming, and gaming.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars627 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
